amendment.description: To increase the number of Department of Homeland Security detention bed spaces by 6,700 total beds in FY 2007.

action.text: Ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4643.

Amendment SA 4643 proposed by Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S7456-7458, S7463; text: CR S7458) To increase the number of Department of Homeland Security detention bed spaces by 6,700 total beds in FY 2007.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4643 proposed by Senator Kyl.
